lines.text: Trasgu: Very clever traveler you bested my tricks, but to be as clever as me you need to be as knowledgeable as me.
Trasgu: Aramo, also known as the god of travel, protects the crossroads. Offerings can be given at crossroads to receive his blessing.
Trasgu: Even more important, my house is nearby hehe!
Trasgu: That's all for now, bye!
